title: Get rid of snow aids map
body:
I don't wanna ranked atm, i'm mildly tired, and performance quite frankly isn't up to standard at this point. I would however like to play norms where i don't have to stare at a white screen all game, however it seems you've made that impossible.....yeah.

This is garbage, and quite frankly I feel like we deserve better, namely a way to remove this bs snowdown map...I appreciate the thought, but it's just trash and hurts to look at, for no real benefit what-so-ever.

Anyone else with me?

replies.body:
Yea, hurts my eyes too. I'm sure they could have at least  added an option to disable it, since they accommodate colour blind people with options. 

Just stick to Ranked queues, since there isn't the christmas theme map. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
well think again riot has just blessed us (once again) with their shitty snow map AGAIN now in ranked too

You know, I was going to write some really sarcastic response blatantly pointing out the fact that the map accents can be disabled just by going into the video options, but I'm just f\*cking over it and can't be f\*cked, so I would appreciate it if you could just imagine I said something really witty and sarcastic, and bring on the b!tchy over-reaction and needless downvotes that I'll just end up ignoring anyway.
Esc > Video > Disable Snowdown Map Skin

That'a nice, but I like the new snow map. Theme maps were something that most players including myself wanted.  I just love how riot is actually taking time and build a stronger bond between their player these past few months and not do stuff like *cough* remove soloqueue
Agreed, this snowdown map makes my eyes so uncomfy, that would be great if we can have options to choose summer rift or winter rift plz
